import 'react-app-polyfill/ie11'; import 'react-app-polyfill/stable'; import React from "react"; import { Card, CardBody, Row, Col } from "reactstrap"; import { Link } from 'react-router-dom'; // core components_chart 입력하는 부분_ // 아래에 차트 이름과, 차트 경로를 입력하면 된다. import chartData from "../../variables/charts.js"; import ReactFC from 'react-fusioncharts'; import ReactFusioncharts from "react-fusioncharts"; import FusionCharts from 'fusioncharts'; import charts from 'fusioncharts/fusioncharts.charts'; import Zoomline from "fusioncharts/fusioncharts.zoomline"; import FusionTheme from 'fusioncharts/themes/fusioncharts.theme.fusion'; ReactFC.fcRoot(FusionCharts, charts, Zoomline, FusionTheme); charts(FusionCharts); let dataSource = []; let url = [ "http://bcmon.kmu.ac.kr/coin-data/bitcoin/graphs/block-size/sum/month", "http://bcmon.kmu.ac.kr/coin-data/bitcoin/graphs/block-size/average/month", "http://bcmon.kmu.ac.kr/coin-data/bitcoin/graphs/block-size/accumulated/month", "http://bcmon.kmu.ac.kr/coin-data/bitcoin/graphs/blocks/difficulty/average/month", "http://bcmon.kmu.ac.kr/coin-data/bitcoin/graphs/blocks/medianconfirmationtime/value/month", "http://bcmon.kmu.ac.kr/coin-data/bitcoin/graphs/blocks/mining-revenue/sum/month", "http://bcmon.kmu.ac.kr/coin-data/bitcoin/graphs/blocks/revenue/sum/month", "http://bcmon.kmu.ac.kr/coin-data/bitcoin/graphs/blocks/emptyblocks/value/month", "http://bcmon.kmu.ac.kr/coin-data/bitcoin/graphs/blocks/strippedsize/average/month", "http://bcmon.kmu.ac.kr/coin-data/bitcoin/graphs/blocks/strippedsize/sum/month", "http://bcmon.kmu.ac.kr/coin-data/bitcoin/graphs/blocks/weight/average/month", "http://bcmon.kmu.ac.kr/coin-data/bitcoin/graphs/blocks/weight/sum/month", "http://bcmon.kmu.ac.kr/coin-data/bitcoin/graphs/blocks/insufficient-strippedsize/value/month", "http://bcmon.kmu.ac.kr/coin-data/bitcoin/graphs/blocks/insufficient-size/value/month", ]; var tag = [ "value", "value", "value", "value", "value", "value", "value", "emptyblock_per_day", "avg_strippedsize_per_day", "sum_strippedsize_per_day", "avg_weight_per_day", "sum_weight_per_day", "abnor_strippedsize_count", "abnor_size_count", ]; var title = [ "Total block size", "Average block Size", "Cumulative block size", "Difficulty", "Mining interval", "Mining Revenue", "Whole revenue", "Empty blocks", "Average stripped block size", "Total stripped block size", "Average block weight", "Total block weight", "Total insufficeint stripped block size", "Total insufficeint block size" ]; var caption = [ "The total block size per day.", "The average block size per day.", "The cumulative value of block size per day.", "The average value of difficulty per day.", "The average value of mining interval per day. Mining interval means the interval unitl the next block is created.", "The total mining revenue (excluding fee) per day.", "The total mining revenue (including fee) per day.", "The total of number of empty blocks per day. Empty block that contains only one transaction (coinbase).", "The average of stripped block size per day.", "The total of stripped block size per day.", "The average of block weight per day.", "The total block weight per day.", "The total insufficient stripped block size per day. Insufficient stripped block size that.", "The total insufficient block size per day. Insufficient block size that" ]; class bitcoinBlock extends React.Component { constructor(props) { super(props); this.state = { bigChartData: "data1" }; } setBgChartData = name => { this.setState({ bigChartData: name }); }; render() { for(var i = 0; i < url.length; i++) { dataSource[i] = chartData.renderGraph(url[i], tag[i], title[i], caption[i], i); console.log("임시 데이터 1 - " + i + " : "); console.log(JSON.stringify(dataSource[i])); } return ( <>

Bitcoin Block
); } } export default bitcoinBlock;
